task: Full pipeline pre-test with VEO3 + Shotstack
description: Generate a short-form product video for Magic Coffee Mug, using a single prompt optimized for VEO3 and a Shotstack timeline. Include pre-test visual verification, traceability logs, and no null values for TypeScript compliance. Prompt Orchestrator ensures VEO3 receives a clean, actionable prompt.

product.name: Magic Coffee Mug
product.description: A mug that keeps coffee hot for 12 hours.

prompt_orchestrator.function: Combine all product info, features, and attached images into a single, VEO3-compatible prompt. Ensure each scene is clear, visually verifiable, and no null values exist. Generate a Shotstack timeline that matches each scene with the corresponding image.
rules: Merge all scenes into one VEO3 prompt to reduce API calls.
Attach images to relevant scenes for image-to-video processing.
Ensure prompt uses natural, descriptive language suitable for VEO3.
Trace every step for review before final execution.
Validate that assetRef points to existing images.

veo3_prompt:
A realistic short-form product ad video for Magic Coffee Mug. Include the following scenes in a single request: 
1. Mug close-up with steam, smooth camera move, shallow depth of field, using image 'images/mug_front.png'. 
2. Mug handle close-up highlighting ergonomic design, using image 'images/mug_side.png'. 
3. Mug call-to-action with lid, visible features, realistic materials, honest lighting, and true-to-life textures, using image 'images/mug_lid.png'.
traceability_notes: All assetRefs provided, no null values.
Prompt Orchestrator ensured VEO3 receives a fully structured, understandable prompt.
Single request used for all scenes to minimize API usage and cost.
Pre-test mode will generate visual previews and logs before full execution.
